summary: Let your favorite dead npc stay with you a bit longer :-)
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=12]Let your favorite dead npc stay with you a bit longer :-)[/size][/b]

I needed this mod for myself, and tho I\'m a developer, I never ever released a mod, so I thought : hey, it\'s time !

So, enjoy, no bugs known, but let me know.

I\'m working on a 2.0 version, where bodies would follow you through warps and stuffs.

[b][size=11]3 versions :[/size][/b]

- Extended Necromancy Perk - Fast Decay (body stays for 10 mins)
- Extended Necromancy Perk - Slow Decay (body stays for 1 hour)
- Extended Necromancy Perk - Zombies (body stays almost indefinately)

No extra mana cost, compatibility with any other mod/saves assured, as only 1 file is modified.

[b][size=11]Basic Use :[/size][/b]

You need to get the Necromancy Perk. Once you get it, duration of all your undead creatures will be modified according to the version you pick. 

[b][size=11]Installation :[/size][/b]

Put in \\Data folder in Skyrim directory, check the file in Data Files from the launcher.

(a useful tip I\'m just forwarding : if your Data Files option is greyed out, add :

bEnableFileSelection=1

to SkyrimPrefs.ini in your Documents\\MyGames\\Skyrim directory ).
author: Dakryk
